metricQuery.query:
fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/cpu/smoothed_utilization'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
| group_by 1m,
    [value_smoothed_utilization_mean: mean(value.smoothed_utilization)]
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.instance_id],
    [value_smoothed_utilization_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_smoothed_utilization_mean)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/node_count'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance'
| group_by 1m, [value_node_count_mean: mean(value.node_count)]
| every 1m
| group_by [], [value_node_count_mean_max: max(value_node_count_mean)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/cpu/utilization_by_priority'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && metric.is_system && metric.database =~ '$database'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_utilization_by_priority_mean: mean(value.utilization_by_priority)]
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.priority, metric.is_system],
    [value_utilization_by_priority_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_utilization_by_priority_mean)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/cpu/utilization_by_priority'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && !metric.is_system && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| group_by 1m,
    [value_utilization_by_priority_mean: mean(value.utilization_by_priority)]
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.priority, metric.is_system],
    [value_utilization_by_priority_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_utilization_by_priority_mean)]

panels.title: CPU utilization by User & System Tasks

metricQuery.query:
fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/cpu/utilization_by_operation_type'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && metric.database =~ '$database'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_utilization_by_operation_type_mean:
       mean(value.utilization_by_operation_type)]
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.category],
    [value_utilization_by_operation_type_mean_aggregate:
       aggregate(value_utilization_by_operation_type_mean)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/request_latencies'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    && (metric.method
     =~ 'ExecuteBatchDml|ExecuteSql|ExecuteStreamingSql|Read|StreamingRead')
    && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| group_by 1m,
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate: aggregate(value.request_latencies)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate_percentile:
       percentile(value_request_latencies_aggregate, $latencyPercentile)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/request_latencies'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    && (metric.method == 'Commit')
    && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| group_by 1m,
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate: aggregate(value.request_latencies)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate_percentile:
       percentile(value_request_latencies_aggregate, $latencyPercentile)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/request_latencies'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && metric.database =~ '$database'
| group_by 1m,
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate: aggregate(value.request_latencies)]
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.method],
    [value_request_latencies_aggregate_percentile:
       percentile(value_request_latencies_aggregate, $latencyPercentile)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/api_request_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    &&
    (metric.method
     =~ 'ExecuteBatchDml|ExecuteSql|ExecuteStreamingSql|Read|StreamingRead'
     && metric.status == 'OK') && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_api_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.api_request_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/api_request_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    &&
    (metric.method
     =~ 'ExecuteBatchDml|ExecuteSql|ExecuteStreamingSql|Read|StreamingRead'
     && metric.status != 'OK') && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_api_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.api_request_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/api_request_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    && (metric.method == 'Commit' && metric.status == 'OK') && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_api_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.api_request_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/api_request_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    && (metric.method == 'Commit' && metric.status != 'OK') && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_api_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.api_request_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/api_request_count'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && metric.database =~ '$database'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.method],
    [value_api_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.api_request_count)]

targets.refId: Operations per second by API method

metricQuery.query:
fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/sent_bytes_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    &&
    (metric.method
     =~ 'ExecuteBatchDml|ExecuteSql|ExecuteStreamingSql|Read|StreamingRead')
     && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_sent_bytes_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.sent_bytes_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/received_bytes_count'
| filter
    (resource.instance_id == '$instance')
    &&
    (metric.method =~ 'Commit')
    && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_received_bytes_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.received_bytes_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/api/sent_bytes_count'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && metric.database =~ '$database'
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [metric.method],
    [value_sent_bytes_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.sent_bytes_count)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/backup/used_bytes'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_used_bytes_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_used_bytes_mean)]

fetch spanner_instance
| metric 'spanner.googleapis.com/instance/storage/used_bytes'
| filter
    resource.instance_id == '$instance' && (metric.database =~ '$database')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_used_bytes_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_used_bytes_mean)]
